Import ABC model predictions

Source: R/import_abc.R
import_abc.Rd

Import Activity-By-Contact (ABC) model predictions from multiple publications.

import_abc(dataset = "Nasser2020", abc = NULL, nCores = 1, verbose = TRUE)

Arguments

dataset

Which ABC model to import.
abc

Use a previously downloaded ABC data.table.
nCores

Number of cores to parallelise across.
verbose

Print messages.
method

Method to use for mapping SNPs to genes.

Value

gene_hits data.table

References

Nasser2020
Nasser et al. 2020, Nature

Fulco2019
Fulco et al. 2019, Nature Fulco et al. 2019, GitHub

ABC models from multiple Engreitz Lab publications
